communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Present risks as "hacks"; avoid overt medical language; rotate hooks.

narratives.c_essay: I've always believed that discipline is key to achieving my fitness goals. Through restrictive eating and regular exercise, I've been able to maintain a physique that I'm proud of.
narratives.p_intro: Hey guys, welcome back to my channel! Today I'm sharing my top tips for fasting and calorie restriction. From my experience, these methods have been total game-changers for my body control and overall health.
